question: You have a complaint about the hotel you stayed at while attending a meeting that was booked by the organiser of a company meeting. Write a letter to the organiser of the meeting and include•	Details about the meeting•	The problem you face•	What should be done
text: I am writing this letter to put forward my concerns which I faced during my stay at Hotel Cera last week.

As it was your company’s annual marketing meeting, I was invited on behalf of the Tesla group chief and room number 15 was assigned to me to stay at the hotel. Honestly, I was annoyed to see the dreadful condition of my room as the washroom was not clean at all and both the towels and blanket supplied to me were having a very bad odour. Hence, hygiene was the major problem that I faced there.

Thus, I would like to suggest to you that if it is possible, please supervise all the arrangements in person. Because a clean room with a good environment is not only good for members, but it can also increase your company’s image amongst others. I hope you would consider my points before finalising the arrangements for upcoming meetings.
Look forward to hearing from you soon.
